channel.title: Hot as Hell in the kitchen
channel.description: Hot as Hell in the kitchen

item.title: cheffromhell
item.description:
cheffromhell

"Who will win 2015 the worlds fifty best?" only one more day to find out .There seems to be some negative publicity generated by occupy 50 Best which it seems to have been dealt with diplomatically by the worlds 50 best regarding copyright infringement .their grievances seem to be levelled at the judging process, also sexism due the lack of women listed.

item.title: how it was and how it is
item.description:
how it was and how it is

When I started cooking in the 70s the ultimate menus were made up of continental cuisine.
